remarks.format:
## Remarks
|Class|Zwraca|Typ renderowania preferowane|Sprawdź wartość właściwości JavaScript| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Sprawdza, czy wartość <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> jest <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> lub <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> Zwraca `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Sprawdza, czy <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> jest <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> lub <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|Możliwości urządzenia <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> zwraca `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Sprawdza, czy <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> jest <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> lub <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|Brak|
